Besides that its a great buy. If your a prime member this is a great buy!!!!!

review: Just installed this a couple of days ago and so far I am very happy with the layout and content.One issue installation frustration I had, which was not directly an issue with the AFTV box, was that the AFTV box was not being recognized as a component on my Samsung Smart TV when I plugged the HDMI cable into the TV set. I tried all different combinations of HDMI cables, ports, etc. but to no avail. After some investigation I found that you need to "unplug" your TV and all together for a few minutes and then connect the HDMI, then power on the TV and finally power on the AFTV box. This worked and I've had no problems since then. This probably does not happen that frequently but I hope this will help someone who might be going through the same frustration that I did during the installation / setup period.
